Necromancer flew from side to side avoiding the missles. the horn 
drills hit him sending him to the ground. the fireballs and 
flamethrower posed no threat so Necromancer took the hits head 
on. "When will you learn about using elemental attacks on an 
elemental?" he raise his weapon and fired five fireballs. (One at 
each.)

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "SOULSTICE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Horn Drill dodged the ice, he prided himself on dodging. Gigas was 
hit by
> the fireballs.
> 
> Kracken: So be it.
> 
> Kracken fired 2 missiles at Necromancer. Horn Drill fired 2 horn 
drills
> (wahaha) at Necromancer. Gigas used the Exploder, a flurry of 
fireballs, and
> hurled the exploding fireballs at Necromancer. Grenade fired his
> flamethrower at Necromancer. Beholder 2 fired 4 shots at 
Necromancer...
> 
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <cyberwolf4@p...>
> To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> Sent: Friday, January 12, 2001 9:43 PM
> Subject: Re: Necromancer's fight with Mobster
